00031 #include "../Purple/ObjectiveFunction/RastriginFunction.h"

00033 // Optimization algorithm includes
00034 
00035 #include "../Purple/OptimizationAlgorithm/EvolutionaryAlgorithm.h"

00037 using namespace Purple;
00038 
00039 int main(void)
00040 {
00041    std::cout << std::endl
00042              << "Purple: An Open Source Numerical Optimization C++ Library." 
00043              << std::endl
00044              << "Evolutionary Algorithm Application." << std::endl;
00045 
00046    srand( (unsigned)time( NULL ) );
00047 
00048    // Rastrigin function object
00049 
00050    RastriginFunction rastriginFunction;
00051 
00052    int numberOfVariables = 5;
00053 
00054    rastriginFunction.setNumberOfVariables(numberOfVariables);
00055 
00056    Vector<double> lowerBound(numberOfVariables, -5.12);
00057    Vector<double> upperBound(numberOfVariables, 5.12);
00058    
00059    rastriginFunction.setLowerBound(lowerBound);
00060    rastriginFunction.setUpperBound(upperBound);
00061 
00062    // Evolutionary algorithm object
00063 
00064    EvolutionaryAlgorithm evolutionaryAlgorithm(&rastriginFunction);
00065    
00066    evolutionaryAlgorithm
00067    .setFitnessAssignmentMethod(EvolutionaryAlgorithm::LinearRanking);
00068 
00069    evolutionaryAlgorithm
00070    .setSelectionMethod(EvolutionaryAlgorithm::StochasticUniversalSampling);
00071 
00072    evolutionaryAlgorithm
00073    .setRecombinationMethod(EvolutionaryAlgorithm::Intermediate);
00074 
00075    evolutionaryAlgorithm
00076    .setMutationMethod(EvolutionaryAlgorithm::Uniform);
00077    
00078    evolutionaryAlgorithm.setPopulationSize(10*numberOfVariables);
00079    
00080    evolutionaryAlgorithm.initPopulationAtRandom(lowerBound, upperBound);
00081    
00082    evolutionaryAlgorithm.setEvaluationGoal(0.001);
00083    evolutionaryAlgorithm.setMaximumNumberOfGenerations(1000);
00084    evolutionaryAlgorithm.setMaximumTime(1000.0);
00085    evolutionaryAlgorithm.setShowPeriod(100);
00086 
00087    evolutionaryAlgorithm.print();   
00088   
00089    Vector<double> minimalArgument = evolutionaryAlgorithm.getMinimalArgument();
00090 
00091    evolutionaryAlgorithm
00092    .save("../Data/EvolutionaryAlgorithm/EvolutionaryAlgorithm.dat");
00093 
00094    evolutionaryAlgorithm
00095    .saveOptimizationHistory("../Data/EvolutionaryAlgorithm/OptimizationHistory.dat");
00096 
00097    std::cout << std::endl;         
00098 
00099    system("pause");
00100 
00101    return(0);
00102 }
